description: Web UI + CLI for generating project context to paste into Claude Code sessions
features: Email triage: 3 tabs (Uncategorized/Categorized/Processed), dealt-with toggle, project assignment dropdown
Email metadata persists in email/email_meta.json (survives cache refreshes)
Sender-project memory: dropdown suggests last project used for that sender
Project card click filters email list to that project
Draggable borders: left/right panels + projects/emails split
known_issues: Must use python -B to avoid pyc caching on restart
Learner sub-agent not yet run on unprocessed sessions
